column4: anyone have problems with coming out of hibernation to a black screen where u have to restart X?
all the time.  I assume you've already made sure your swap file exceeds your ram?
the size of your swap partition -- /swap when you did your partitioning in the beginning--has to be larger than the amount of RAM you have, or hibernate fails.
assuming it's the right size, though, because lots of things foul up hibernation, maybe this might help you:  http://preview.tinyurl.com/32tn5e
